ARABIC: أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَٰبَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنَ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِينٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Did I not make a contract with you, tribe of Adam, not to worship Shaytan, who truly is an outright enemy to you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Did I not commit you, O children of Adam, not to worship Satan who is your acknowledged foe,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Children of Adam, did I not command you not to serve Satan -- he is to you an open enemy
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Children of Adam, did We not command you not to worship satan. He was your sworn enemy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “O Descendants of Adam! Did I not take a covenant from you that you shall not worship the devil? Undoubtedly, he is your open enemy.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Did I not command you, O Children of Adam, that you should not worship Shaytan Verily, he is a plain enemy to you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Did I not charge you, O children of Adam! that you should not serve the Shaitan? Surely he is your open enemy,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Made I not covenant with you, Children of Adam, that you should not serve Satan -- surely he is a manifest foe to you --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Did I not charge you, O ye sons of Adam, that ye worship not the devil - Lo! he is your open foe! -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Did I not enjoin you, sons of Adam, not to worship Satan -- for he is your sworn enemy,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Enjoined I not on you, ye children of Adam, that ye shall not worship the Satan - verily he is Unto you manifest foe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘Did I not exhort you, O children of Adam, saying, “Do not worship Satan. He is indeed your manifest enemy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Did I not enjoin on you, O ye Children of Adam, that ye should not worship Satan; for that he was to you an enemy avowed?-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Did I not ordain for you, O Children of Adam, that you should not worship Shaitan (Satan). Verily, he is a plain enemy to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Children of Adam, did I not make a covenant with you, that you should not worship satan he is surely a clear enemy to you
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Did I not covenant with you, O Children of Adam, that you shall not serve the devil? That he is your sworn enemy?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Did I not enjoin upon you, O children of Adam, that you not worship Satan - [for] indeed, he is to you a clear enemy -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:60] Did I not charge you, command you, O children of Adam, by the tongues of My messengers, that you should not worship Satan, [that you should] not obey him; truly he is a manifest enemy to you, one whose enmity is evident,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: He will also say to them: (Did I not charge you) did I not present to you, in the Scripture brought by the Messenger, (0 ye sons of Adam, that ye worship not the devil) that you should not obey the devil. (Lo! he is your open foe) whose enmity is quite manifest!
